sentence: * `--exhaustive-search` is usable with ungapped alignments (`--alignment-mode 4`)

sentence: * Fix various inconsistencies and usability issues in `alignall`:
author: soedinglab

sentence: * `(easy-)search --slice-search` is now usable.

sentence: * `createdb` and the various `easy-` workflows learned to read query input from `STDIN`

sentence: * `taxonomyreport` learned to display the summarized taxonomy result with Krona

sentence: * `createdb` learned to index an existing (single-line-seq per entry) FASTA file without copying the FASTA content to a new database

sentence: * `align` and `rescorediagonal` learned to align circular sequences

sentence: * `reverseseq` learned to reverse profiles

sentence: All archives contain a copy of the user guide and the MMseqs2 binary in the same subfolder (see further down for binaries of release 10-6d92c):
author: soedinglab

sentence: * `cluster` workflow learned a reassignment mode `--cluster-reassign`.
author: soedinglab

sentence: At a glance: Improved taxonomy, add colors to user output, improve computation progress bar, small speed ups and many bug fixes

sentence: * New progress bar to reduce output

sentence: * `convertalis` has learned to return SAM formatted output (preview)

sentence: * `align` module has learned `--min-aln-len` parameter to filter by minimal alignment length
